message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal. While your offer is certainly tempting, I believe the product's true value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000. This still represents a significant discount from my initial offer and reflects the product's worth.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
